title: ISic003348. I.Sicily inscription 003348
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΟΔΑΜΟΣ
2ΑΝΤΙΜΑΧΟΝ
3ΦΙΛΩΝΟΣ
4[.]ΥΕΡΓΕΤΑΝ

Apparatus criticus

Text: Manganaro 1965

English translation

The people (honours) Antimachos son of Philo, benefactor

commentary
